title: Unable to connect to the authentication service
body: Yesterday I could play normally but since today I cannot log in. I tried closing background apps, temporarily uninstalling my Anti Virus program and repairing my client but nothing works. Does anybody know what I should do?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is getting blocked while reaching the authentication server, so while adjusting antivirus settings might help there are other factors too.  See if auto-configuring your firewall settings with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) helps.  If not, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help clear up any snags.
